questions.title: 我想知道商务会议在哪儿召开。
questions.answer: I'd like to know where the business meeting is to be held.

questions.title: 谁也无法猜出这场足球赛到底会发生什么。
questions.answer: No one could guess what was going to happen in this football game.

questions.title: 请告诉我你的兴趣是什么。
questions.answer: Please tell me what your interest is.

questions.title: 露西知道谁能给她真正的感觉。
questions.answer: Lucy knows who will give her true feeling.

questions.title: 我想要知道为什么我班上所有的学生都不开心。
questions.answer: I wondered why all students in my class were not happy.

title: ——我想知道你的老板什么时候抵达上海虹桥机场。
——目前我也不知道，真的很麻烦你让你一直等在那里。

answer.en: I'd like to know when your boss will arrive at Shanghai HongqiaoAirport.
I know nothing about it at present, I'm sorry to trouble you to keep youwaiting there.
I wondered what the result of the European Cup is.
I shall tell you as soon as I have time.
I'd like to know how tall Yao Ming is.
